item.description: We are excited to announce one fully funded postdoctoral research position as part of our newly accepted project on AI-driven automated reasoning for higher-order logic and algebraic theories. The project builds on recent breakthroughs such as Enigma, Deepire, and Monte Carlo proof search, and aims to develop autonomous reasoning systems that combine symbolic and statistical guidance, applied to open research-level problems in algebraic domains (e.g., loop theory, AIM Conjecture) and large-theory interactive theorem proving.
